attributes.action: stop benefits to mothers under the age of consent!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law has put the age of consent at 16 for a reason, believing that below this age, people are too young. Yet, thirteen year old mothers and fathers are not unusual, and rather than being punished...the government is using the taxpayers money to help them live, technically rewarding their breaking of the law.
